welcome:
Welcome to Codinomes!!
Choose your language
questions:
Have questions? Check out /help

Play or report bugs in our official group as well @CodinomesGrupo

classic_info:
Classic game mode

8 cards for each team (+1 for the team that starts), 7 white and 1 black
fast_info:
Fast game mode, similar to classic mode but shorter

4 cards for each team (+1 for the team that starts), 3 white and 1 black
mineswp_info:
Minesweeper mode, similar to classic mode but full of black cards and no white cards

8 cards for each team (+1 for the team that starts), 0 white and 8 black
mystery_info:
Mystery Mode, it's like the classic mode but the agents don't know the color of the revealed cards until someone wins the game

Guessing wrong doesn't skip the turn, but guessing a black card still results in an immediate loss
8ball_info:
Eight-ball mode, it's like the classic mode, but after finding all your cards, you must finish by finding the black card to win without any hints

7 cards for each team (+1 for the team that starts), 9 white, and 1 black
crazy_info: Crazy mode, each round the unrevealed cards swap colors with each other, making previous hints completely useless, but providing the opportunity for new hint combinations for the current round
sp_crazy_info: Super Crazy Mode, it's like Crazy Mode, but in addition to the colors, the actual words in play are also changed

already_exists: There's already a game going on in this group
try_official_group: Consider starting a game in our official group @CodinomesGrupo to find fellow players!
master_occupied: This team already have a master
sure_skip: Do you really want to skip?

suggestion: Remember that you can choose a default /color to be automatically applied when you enter a game

admin_only_info: Choose if only group admins can change settings, stop games, etc
compound_words_info: Allows compound word (with space or hyphen) as hints
timer_info: Choose how long players can take to make their play
notify_list: Notifications enabled in the following groups (tap to turn off):

user_not_registered: DM the bot to gain access to that
master_not_registered: I don't have access to masters dm to send them the image
already_playing: You're already playing in another group
admin_only: Only group admins can do that
no_required_players: The game needs at least a player for each role to get started
only_oficial_groups:
For now, the bot is undergoing testing and therefore is only functioning in official groups

Join @CodinomesGrupo to play
wrong_hint_format_desc: A hint up to 20 characters + number of cards which this hint refers to. Examples: Fear 2, Shiny 3...
wrong_guess_format_desc: Just enter the first letters of the word and it will appear right here
color_taken: Color already taken by the other team
master_only: Only the master can do that
no_enough_cards: There's no enough cards in the actived packs to start the game
no_packs: There are no selected word packs, choose them in /settings and feel free to create your own packs by sending /packs as a dm to the bot
must_be_supergroup: This bot only works in supergroups (changing an admin's role name is enough to transform a group into a supergroup, after that send /start)
dm_inline: Don't use inline in the bot's private chat, just send the hint as a simple message
only_agent_role: The master has already received the table in private
hidden_on_mystery: Hidden Statistics during matches in Mystery Mode

base:
*Codinomes* is a word guessing game, based on hints, divided into two Teams of different colors made up of a Master and several Agents\.

The team that finds all cards of their own color first wins\.

‚Ä¢ Roles: /help\_roles
‚Ä¢ Hints: /help\_hints
‚Ä¢ Colors: /help\_colors

‚Ä¢ Commands: /help\_commands
‚Ä¢ Game modes: /help\_modes

If you have any questions, ask in @CodinomesGrupo
hints:
*Basic hints:*
**>Hints must be a single word followed by the number of cards that are related to that clue\.
>
>*Example: EVEREST 3*
>*Words:* SNOW, COLD and MOUNTAIN
>
>Your agents can try to guess up to the number of the current hint \+ 1 extra card\.||
*Special hints*
**>*Infinity Hint ‚àû:* If you need your agents to try more cards than this, you can submit your hint without the number and it will become an Infinity Hint\. They can try as many cards as they want until they make a wrong guess, but they won't know how many words relate to the current hint\.
>
>*Zero Hint 0:* You can also submit a hint with the number 0\. It also has infinite attempts, but it serves to give hint on which cards your agents should avoid\.||
commands:
*Codinomes Commands:*
**>‚Ä¢ /new creates a new game lobby
>‚Ä¢ /skip skip your turn in the game
>‚Ä¢ /stop interrupts and cancels the match
>
>‚Ä¢ /notify send it to a group to be notified whenever a new match takes place in it \(send it again to cancel\), sending in private will show a list of all enabled notifications for you to disable
>
>‚Ä¢ /history view the history of hints and attempts from the match, it also works via DM
>
>‚Ä¢ /settings group settings \(as timer and word packs\)
>
>‚Ä¢ /color choose your default color that will be set automatically when you enter as a master
>
>‚Ä¢ /packs send it to DM to create and manage your own word packages||

seven_one_info: Reach the 7\-1 score in a match
sixsixsix_info: Reach the 6\-6\-6 score in a Triple Mode match
hurry_info: Flip all your cards in a single round in fast mode
good_start_info: Flip a black card on the first try \(classic mode only\)
day_is_night_info: Flip the black card missing one card to win the game \(classic mode only\)
impostor_info: Flip the opponent's last card, leading them to victory
rainbow: At the End of the Rainbow
pride_info: Play with all June special colors
making_friends_info: Play a match in the official group
kian_knows_info: Play a match with the developer

üîî You can send /notify in a group to be alerted whenever there's a new game there
